Wisdom: الْمُعِينُ عَلَى الطَّاعَةِ خَيْرُ الْأَصْحَابِ
enWisdom: The one who assists [you] in obeying [Allah] is the best companion

Wisdom: خَيْرُ إِخْوَانِكَ مَنْ عَنَّفَكَ فِي طَاعَةِ اللَّهِ سُبْحَانَهُ
enWisdom: The best of your brothers is the one who is stern with you regarding obedience to Allah

Wisdom: الْإِخْوَانُ زِينَةٌ فِي الرَّخَاءِ وَعُدَّةٌ فِي الْبَلَاءِ
enWisdom: Brothers are an embellishment in times of ease and a [means of] support in times of tribulation

Wisdom: الصَّدِيقُ إِنْسَانٌ هُوَ أَنْتَ إِلَّا أَنَّهُ غَيْرُكَ
enWisdom: A friend is a better asset and is more lasting in fondness

Wisdom: الْأَصْدِقَاءُ نَفْسٌ وَاحِدَةٌ فِي جُسُومٍ مُتَفَرِّقَةٍ
enWisdom: The wise person is one who selects his friend carefully, for a man is gauged by his friend

Wisdom: اصْحَبْ أَخَا الْتُّقَى وَالدِّينِ تَسْلَمْ وَاسْتَرْشِدْهُ تَغْنَمْ
enWisdom: Keep yourself in the company of a virtuous and pious brother and you will remain safe, seek advice from him and you will benefit

Wisdom: اخْتَرْ مِنْ كُلِّ شَيْ‏ءٍ جَدِيدَهُ وَمِنَ الْإِخْوَانِ أَقْدَمَهُمْ
enWisdom: Choose the new of everything but the oldest one from among your brothers

Wisdom: خَيْرُ كُلِّ شَيْ‏ءٍ جَدِيدُهُ وَخَيْرُ الْإِخْوَانِ أَقْدَمُهُمْ
enWisdom: The best of all things is that which is newer, but the best of brothers is the oldest of them

Wisdom: أَحَقُّ النَّاسِ أَنْ يُونَسَ بِهِ الْوَدُودُ الْمَأْلُوفُ
enWisdom: The most deserving of intimacy among the people is the close friend

Wisdom: أَفْضَلُ الْعُدَدِ ثِقَاتُ الْإِخْوَانِ
enWisdom: Be careful not to ignore the right of your brother while relying on the bond between you and him, for he whose right you overlook is not your brother

Wisdom: أَوْلَى مَنْ أَحْبَبْتَ مَنْ لَا يَقْلَاكَ
enWisdom: The most deserving of those whom you love is the one who does not forsake you

Wisdom: أَفْضَلُ الْعُدَدِ أَخٌ وَفِيٌّ وَشَقِيقٌ زَكِيٌّ
enWisdom: The best assets are reliable brothers

Wisdom: أَفْضَلُ النَّاسِ سَالِفَةً عِنْدَكَ مَنْ أَسْلَفَكَ حُسْنَ التَّأْمِيلِ لَكَ
enWisdom: The best of all people who have preceded you is the one who has preceded you in his good expectation of you

Wisdom: أَصْدَقُ الْإِخْوَانِ مَوَدَّةً أَفْضَلُهُمْ لِإِخْوَانِهِ فِي السَّرَّاءِ وَالضَّرَّاءِ مُوَاسَاةً
enWisdom: The best of assets are a loyal brother and a righteous sibling

Wisdom: إِنَّ مُوَاسَاةَ الرِّفَاقِ مِنْ كَرَمِ الْأَعْرَاقِ
enWisdom: Verily supporting [one’s] companions financially is a sign of noble descent

Wisdom: خَيْرُ إِخْوَانِكَ مَنْ وَاسَاكَ
enWisdom: The best of your brothers is the one who assists you financially [in your time of need]

Wisdom: نِظَامُ الْكَرَمِ مُوَالاةُ الْإِحْسَانِ وَمُوَاسَاةُ الْإِخْوَانِ
enWisdom: The order of nobleness entails successively doing good to others and assisting one’s brothers [financially]

Wisdom: نِظَامُ الدِّينِ خَصْلَتَانِ إِنْصَافُكَ مِنْ نَفْسِكَ وَمُوَاسَاةُ إِخْوَانِكَ
enWisdom: The structure of religion is [based on] two qualities: your impartiality towards yourself and supporting your brethren

Wisdom: مَا حُفِظَتِ الْأُخُوَّةُ بِمِثْلِ الْمُوَاسَاةِ
enWisdom: Nothing preserves brotherhood like financial support [in times of need]

Wisdom: إِنَّمَا يُحِبُّكَ مَنْ لَا يَتَمَلَّقُكَ وَيُثْنِي عَلَيْكَ مَنْ لَا يُسْمِعُكَ
enWisdom: Indeed only he who does not flatter you loves you, and only he who does not let you hear [his praise] praises you

Wisdom: تَمَسَّكْ بِكُلِّ صَدِيقٍ أَفَادَتْكَهُ الشِّدَّةُ
enWisdom: Hold on to every friend who is brought close to you by hard times (and who benefits you in times of distress)

Wisdom: خَيْرُ الْإِخْوَانِ مَنْ لَا يُحْوِجُ إِخْوَانَهُ إِلَى سِوَاهُ
enWisdom: The best of brothers are the least hypocritical in giving good advice

Wisdom: خَيْرُ الْإِخْوَانِ مَنْ لَمْ يَكُنْ عَلَى إِخْوَانِهِ مُسْتَقْصِياً
enWisdom: The best of your brothers is the one who supports you, and better than him is the one who suffices for you, and when he needs you, he excuses you [if you are unable to assist him]

Wisdom: خَيْرُ إِخْوَانِكَ مَنْ كَثُرَ إِغْضَابُهُ لَكَ فِي الْحَقِّ
enWisdom: The best of brothers is one who does not scrutinize his brothers

Wisdom: خَيْرُ الْإِخْوَانِ مَنْ لَمْ تَكُنْ عَلَى الدُّنْيَا أُخُوَّتُهُ
enWisdom: The best brother is one whose brotherhood is not based on worldly gain

Wisdom: خَيْرُ الْإِخْوَانِ مَنْ إِذَا فَقَدْتَهُ لَمْ تُحِبَّ الْبَقَاءَ بَعْدَهُ
enWisdom: The best brother is one after whose loss you would not like to remain [alive]

Wisdom: خَيْرُ إِخْوَانِكَ مَنْ سَارَعَ إِلَى الْخَيْرِ وَجَذَبَكَ إِلَيْهِ وَأَمَرَكَ بِالْبِرِّ وَأَعَانَكَ عَلَيْهِ
enWisdom: The best of your brothers is one who rushes towards good and pulls you towards it, and enjoins you to righteousness and assists you in it

Wisdom: خَيْرُ إِخْوَانِكَ مَنْ دَعَاكَ إِلَى صِدْقِ الْمَقَالِ بِصِدْقِ مَقَالِهِ وَنَدَبَكَ إِلَى أَفْضَلِ الْأَعْمَالِ بِحُسْنِ أَعْمَالِهِ
enWisdom: The best of your brothers is the one who exhorts you to speak the truth by his own veracity and compels you to perform the best deeds by his own good actions

Wisdom: خَيْرُ الْإِخْوَانِ أَعْوَنُهُمْ عَلَى الْخَيْرِ وَأَعْمَلُهُمْ بِالْبِرِّ وَأَرْفَقُهُمْ بِالْمُصَاحِبِ
enWisdom: The best brother is the most helpful of them in [performing] good deeds, the most active in doing good deeds and the most affable in companionship

Wisdom: عَلَيْكَ بِإِخْوَانِ الصَّفَاءِ فَإِنَّهُمْ زِينَةٌ فِي الرَّخَاءِ وَعَوْنٌ فِي الْبَلَاءِ
enWisdom: You should keep ties with brethren of purity, for they are an embellishment in times of ease and a support in [times of] tribulation

Wisdom: مَنْ لَانَتْ عَرِيكَتُهُ وَجَبَتْ مَحَبَّتُهُ
enWisdom: One whose nature is gentle, loving him is unavoidable

Wisdom: مَنْ كَذَّبَ سُوءَ الظَّنِّ بِأَخِيهِ كَانَ ذَا عَقْدٍ صَحِيحٍ وَقَلْبٍ مُسْتَرِيحٍ
enWisdom: One who belies the evil assumption about his brother has a sound covenant [of brotherhood] and a relaxed heart

Wisdom: مَنْ أَحْسَنَ مُصَاحَبَةَ الْإِخْوَانِ اسْتَدَامَ مِنْهُمُ الْوُصْلَةَ
enWisdom: Do not rely on your friend until you have tested him, and be extremely cautious of your enemy

Wisdom: مَنْ خَلَصَتْ مَوَدَّتُهُ احْتُمِلَتْ دَالَتُهُ
enWisdom: One whose friendship is sincere, his audacity is tolerated

Wisdom: مَا أَقَلَّ الثِّقَةَ الْمُؤْتَمَنَ وَأَكْثَرَ الْخَوَّانَ
enWisdom: How few are the reliable, trustworthy people, and how many are the treacherous!

Wisdom: وُدُّ أَبْنَاءِ الْآخِرَةِ يَدُومُ لِدَوَامِ سَبَبِهِ
enWisdom: The friendship of the people who care for the Hereafter lasts as long as its motive [of pleasing Allah] lasts

Wisdom: لَا تَطْلُبَنَّ الْإِخَاءَ عِنْدَ أَهْلِ الْجَفَاءِ وَاطْلُبْهُ عِنْدَ أَهْلِ الْحِفَاظِ وَالْوَفَاءِ
enWisdom: Do not seek brotherhood [and friendship] among the uncouth people, rather seek it among the trustworthy and loyal people

Wisdom: يُغْتَنَمُ مُؤَاخَاةُ الْأَخْيَارِ وَيُجْتَنَبُ مُصَاحَبَةُ الْأَشْرَارِ وَالْفُجَّارِ
enWisdom: There is no good in the brother who does not enjoin on you what he enjoins on himself
